com.se.simplicity.viewport
Interface Viewport

public interface Viewport

A viewport on which a rendered SceneGraph can be displayed.

Implementors of this interface should be GUI objects that are able to display the rendered SceneGraph.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Method Summary
 void displaySceneGraph()
           Displays the rendered SceneGraph on this Viewport.
 int getHeight()
           Retrieves the height of this Viewport.
 PickingEngine getPickingEngine()
           Retrieves the PickingEngine with which the SceneGraph is picked.
 RenderingEngine getRenderingEngine()
           Retrieves the RenderingEngine that is used to render this Viewport.
 int getWidth()
           Retrieves the width of this Viewport.
 void setPickingEngine(PickingEngine pickingEngine)
           Sets the PickingEngine with which the SceneGraph is picked.
 void setRenderingEngine(RenderingEngine renderingEngine)
           Sets the RenderingEngine that is used to render this Viewport.
 void setSize(int width, int height)
           Sets the size of this Viewport.
